Donuts!
  • Home
  • Press Kit
  • Team

Donuts! is a slapstick 3D racing and skateboarding game meets food delivery service.

You play as Mony, a first generation Cambodian-American, as she sets off to save her family's slowing donut business through means of food trucks, viral marketing, and radical tricks!

Features

  • Perform skateboard tricks in a food truck to make donuts.

  • Race against the clock to make your deliveries on time.

  • Gather a social media following to save your family's donut shop.

  • Explore a beautiful southern california-inspired world.

  • Meet a colorful cast of characters and learn more about the cambodian-american experience.
